title: Blood: what is it?
creator_credit: Jim Mann, TV Ed Productions and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: Margaret Brumby from the Monash University and Peter Carolan from the Blood Bank explains the composition of blood, tests and procedures of the Blood Bank and discuss related social issues. The program also shows how a blood smear is made as well as a blood group testing.
creator_credit_for_label: Jim Mann, TV Ed Productions and Jeff Spencer
